snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include a children’s car seat that electronically monitors the occupant and sends alerts to a smartphone, South...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include a children’s car seat that electronically monitors the occupant and sends alerts to a smartphone, South Korea stepping up its efforts to deter cyberattacks and a virtual currency’s surge in popularity.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Anonymous vs. North Korea, and Hijacked Webcams
